name: EDITED: Eldarya thème Sirène - Mermaid theme v.3.1
description:
Created by Roshelle. Original Theme: Click me!.

This theme loved much (because my character is a Nymph), the problem is that the original theme not befitted well with updating the site. So I repair some bugs and remove some drawbacks. Roshelle, do not be angry with me please, just a little repair your original theme, you can copy the new CSS and paste it into your theme, and I delete this style without any problems.
